moduslam.map_manager.map_factories.lidar_map.factory module

Factory for a lidar map.

config – configuration of the factory.

property map: PointcloudMap

Lidar point cloud map instance.

create_map(graph: Graph[LidarPose, LidarOdometry], batch_factory: BatchFactory) → None[source]

Creates a lidar point cloud map.

Parameters:

  • graph – graph to create a map from.

  • batch_factory – factory to create a data batch.

_create_points_map(vertex_elements_table: dict[LidarPose, deque[Element]]) → ndarray[source]

Creates a points map from the given “vertex -> elements” table.

Parameters:

vertex_elements_table – “vertex -> elements” table.

Returns:

Points map array [N,3].

Raises:

TypeError – if the sensor is not of type Lidar3D.

_create_pointcloud(pose: tuple[tuple[float, float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float, float]], tf: list[list[float]], values: tuple[float, ...]) → ndarray[source]

Creates a pointcloud from the given values and transforms it according to the vertex pose and base -> lidar transformation. Ignores intensity values.

Parameters:

  • pose – pose SE(3).

  • tf – base -> lidar transformation SE(3).

  • values – raw lidar point cloud data.

Returns:

Point cloud array [4, N].
